segments.text: Did you go camping last Saturday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We went to the coast . It's really a nice place for camping , really good time around the fire singing and dancing .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How many members were in your party in all ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you get caught in the bad storm ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we got wet through . But we still enjoyed ourselves .
segments.speaker: S2
